column2: Walak of the tribe Harkoni, was born in ancient times and was turned into a vampire by Abhorash, champion of Lahmia in Nehekhara. He defeated and turned the once noble Blood Dragons to practice his morbid sense of chivalry.

Walak of the tribe Harkoni, was born in ancient times and was turned into a vampire by Abhorash, champion of Lahmia in Nehekhara. He defeated and turned the once noble Blood Dragons to practice his morbid sense of chivalry.
